com.bit6.sdk.websocket

Class ByteBufferOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • com.bit6.sdk.websocket.ByteBufferOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ByteBufferOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    OutputStream wrapping a ByteBuffer. This class internally allocates a direct ByteBuffer for use i.e. with NIO for socket I/O. The ByteBuffer is automatically enlarged if needed (preserving contents when enlarged).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteBufferOutputStream()
      Create a direct allocated ByteBuffer wrapped as OutputStream.
      ByteBufferOutputStream(int initialSize, int growSize)
      Create a direct allocated ByteBuffer wrapped as OutputStream.
